newsitem.title: USA: Norfolk Southern ups bid for Conrail.
newsitem.headline: Norfolk Southern ups bid for Conrail.

text.p: Norfolk Southern Corp said on Thursday it increased its cash offer for all of Conrail Inc outstanding common shares to $115 per share from its previous bid of $110 per share.

Earlier Thursday, CSX Corp and Conrail amended their $8.5 billion merger pact to give Conrail holders another $870 million. They also revised the pact to prohibit either company from entering an agreement with a third party until the end of 1998. The previous deal set a July 1997 date.
Norfolk Southern said it would challenge the legality of this provision, which extended the lockup period.
